text: Camilla Sacre-Dallerup (born 6 April 1974) is a Danish author, life coach, and hypnotherapist. She is also a former professional ballroom dancer. == Life == She was born in Aalborg, Denmark, and began dancing at age two. At 12, she won the Danish Junior Championships. She later moved to London and danced with Brendan Cole, followed by Ian Waite. She competed in major dance championships and represented the UK in the Eurovision Dance Contest 2007. Camilla is best known for being a professional dancer on the BBC show Strictly Come Dancing from 2004 to 2008. She won the sixth series in 2008 with actor Tom Chambers. She also appeared on other TV shows, including Dance Factory, The Underdog Show, and I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! in 2009. She left that show early due to exhaustion. Since leaving professional dancing, she has worked as a life coach and hypnotherapist. She is married to actor Kevin Sacre. == References ==
title: Camilla Sacre-Dallerup
